articles.title: The Galileo constellation grows bigger after successful Launch 11 - Geospatial World
articles.description: Two new Galileo satellites were successfully launched from the European spaceport in Kourou, French Guiana on 4 December 2021, bringing the number of Galileo satellites launched to a total of 28 satellites, thereby enabling the provision of more robust servic…

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Pope chides Europe, comforts migrants on return to Lesbos - Fox News
articles.description: Pope Francis returned Sunday to the Greek island of Lesbos to offer comfort to migrants at a refugee camp and blast what he said was Europe's indifference and self-interest “that condemns to death those on the fringes.”

articles.title: When the (lack of) vaccine of the other interferes: Ômicron brings debate on distribution - Play Crazy Game
articles.description: Suddenly, life was almost back to normal. Perhaps not so 'suddenly' in Brazil, with its more than 615,000 killed by covid-19 and a long saga for the distribution of vaccines. But the fact is that, in countries like Europe and the United States, the high rates…
